snippet: Plus, planning ahead for iOS 8, the next version of Apple’s mobile operating system.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A column on app display in Windows 8.1 system; running iOS 8 on iPhone 5; Tip of the Week using Google Maps without an Internet connection.
lead_paragraph: Plus, planning ahead for iOS 8, the next version of Apple’s mobile operating system.

headline.main: Restoring Internet Explorer 11 to Windows 8.1 App Tiles
